summary: Billing application with performance optimization for data handling
architectural_notes: App deployed on Internet Computer blockchain with 8GB storage limit per canister
Data stored across decentralized network nodes with automatic redundancy
Web application accessible via browser (not native mobile APK)
Zero ongoing hosting costs with indefinite URL validity
known_issues: Potential performance degradation with large datasets without pagination
Initial load fetches all data which may slow down with scale

existing_features.title: Add pagination controls to DataReports component to navigate through collection entries
Add lazy loading to bill generation so detailed collection entries are only fetched when user generates a bill
Implement React Query caching strategy for frequently accessed data like rates and farmer list
Add pagination to transaction history display in FarmerTransactionHistory component

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement pagination to load 50-100 records at a time
Add indexed queries to filter data on backend
Implement lazy loading for bill details
Add caching for frequently accessed data
Add pagination to milk collection data queries with a page size of 50-100 records per page
Implement backend indexed queries to filter collections by date and session before returning to frontend
